meta.description: Optimize the selection of food items to meet dietary requirements at the lowest cost.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Available food items to choose from.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content in grams per serving of each food item.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content in grams per serving of each food item.

params.name: calories
params.description: Caloric content per serving of each food item.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per serving of each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of servings of each food item.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the selected food items.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure the total protein meets the minimum requirement.

constraints.name: carbohydrate_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure the total carbohydrates meet the minimum requirement.

constraints.name: calorie_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure the total calories meet the minimum requirement.
